@KATVNews @POTUS @KimReynoldsIA 1. All multi-national orgs should pause business in Russia+Belarus (Starbucks, McDonalds, Netflix, etc.)

2. Every nation increase production of energy, including oil+gas, reducing dependence on Putin's exports

3. Move Turkey, India, UAE, others away from Putin

4. Stay unified!
